snippet: Playing without their starting quarterback, Tyler Wilson, Arkansas was shut out by No. 1 Alabama, adding to the turmoil surrounding the Razorbacks’ program.
abstract: Alabama rolls over Arkansas, 52-0, in college football.
lead_paragraph: Playing without their starting quarterback, Tyler Wilson, Arkansas was shut out by No. 1 Alabama, adding to the turmoil surrounding the Razorbacks’ program.

headline.seo: Alabama Blows Out Arkansas in SEC Matchup
headline.main: Tide Put Beating on Razorbacks; So Do Razorbacks
headline.print_headline: Tide Put Beating On Razorbacks; So Do Razorbacks
